title: Flicker Style - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Tragedy
tags: Complex Family Relationships   Familial Love   Kidnappings   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Overprotective Siblings   Revenge   R*pe   Stalkers   Suicides   Unreliable Narrator
author: Yuya Sato   佐藤 友哉
description: My little sister hanged herself, and my devastated mother called me. An amused trespasser showed me a video of my sister's rape, and pointed me to the location of the rapists' beloved daughters. I grab my stun gun and enact my kidnapping plan. But the city is also home to Jack the Stabber, whom 77 girls have fallen prey to.>
